channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portable Runtime (APR)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Portable Runtime (APR)

item.title: CVE-2021-35940|2024-08-04T00:40:47.582Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20portable%20runtime%20%28apr%29
item.description: An out-of-bounds array read in the apr_time_exp*() functions was fixed in the Apache Portable Runtime 1.6.3 release (CVE-2017-12613). The fix for this issue was not carried forward to the APR 1.7.x branch, and hence version 1.7.0 regressed compared to 1.6.3 and is vulnerable to the same issue.
